faq.title: CreativeForge - Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Everything you need to know about creating professional content with CreativeForge platform.

items.question: What is CreativeForge?
items.answer: CreativeForge is a comprehensive creative platform that helps content creators, marketers, and businesses produce professional visual content using advanced AI technology. From social media posts to marketing materials, we make content creation fast and easy.

items.question: Who is CreativeForge designed for?
items.answer: CreativeForge is perfect for content creators, social media managers, digital marketers, small business owners, freelancers, and anyone who needs to create visual content regularly for their brand or clients.

items.question: What types of content can I create?
items.answer: You can create social media posts, marketing graphics, product images, blog headers, advertisements, thumbnails, logos, and any other visual content you need. Our platform supports various formats and platforms.

items.question: Do I need design experience to use CreativeForge?
items.answer: Not at all! CreativeForge is designed for everyone, regardless of design experience. Simply describe what you want in plain language, and our AI will handle the technical aspects of design and creation.

items.question: Can I maintain my brand consistency?
items.answer: Yes! CreativeForge allows you to create brand templates with your colors, fonts, and style preferences. This ensures all your content maintains a consistent look and feel across all platforms.

items.question: What platforms and formats are supported?
items.answer: CreativeForge supports all major social media platforms including Instagram, TikTok, YouTube, LinkedIn, Twitter, Facebook, and more. We automatically optimize dimensions and formats for each platform.

items.question: How many images can I create at once?
items.answer: You can generate multiple variations of your concept simultaneously, allowing you to explore different options and choose the best ones for your campaign or content strategy.

items.question: Can I use CreativeForge content commercially?
items.answer: Yes! All content created with CreativeForge can be used for commercial purposes, including marketing campaigns, client work, and business promotions. Check our terms of service for complete usage rights.
